statements: SELECT full_name, date_of_birth FROM patients;
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT full_name, email FROM patients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, phone_number, email FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, full_name, address FROM patients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT full_name, date_of_birth, gender FROM patients WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT * FROM patients ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT full_name, phone_number FROM patients WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE address ILIKE '%street%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' ORDER BY appointment_date DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time > '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM patients WHERE first_name = 'John'
SELECT patient_id, last_name, email FROM patients WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM patients ORDER BY patient_id DESC
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_name = 'Dr. Smith' AND appointment_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_name, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = CURDATE()
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_email FROM patients WHERE patient_age > 30;
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, patient_phone FROM patients ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2023-01-15';
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty, doctor_email FROM doctors;
SELECT * FROM patients
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, patient_age FROM patients
SELECT doctor_name, doctor_specialty FROM doctors
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, appointment_notes FROM appointments
SELECT patient_name, patient_email, doctor_name FROM patients JOIN appointments ON patients.patient_id = appointments.patient_id JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1995-01-01';
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, location FROM doctors ORDER BY specialty DESC;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, appointment_time FROM appointments WHERE appointment_date = '2022-09-15';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosed_condition, treatment FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM patients ORDER BY gender DESC;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM patients WHERE gender='F' ORDER BY date_of_birth ASC;
SELECT doctor_name, specialty, location FROM doctors WHERE specialty='Cardiology';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosed_condition FROM patients JOIN medical_history ON patients.patient_id = medical_history.patient_id WHERE diagnosed_condition='Diabetes';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT first_name, last_name, date_of_birth FROM patients ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, first_name, specialty FROM doctors WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology';
SELECT appointment_date, start_time, end_time FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 1 AND appointment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, medical_condition FROM medical_history JOIN patients ON medical_history.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE diagnosis_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM appointments WHERE doctor_id = 3 AND appointment_date >= '2022-09-01';
SELECT patient_id, first_name, last_name FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY last_name ASC;

SELECT appointments.appointment_id, doctors.first_name AS doctor_first_name, patients.first_name AS patient_first_name FROM appointments JOIN doctors ON appointments.doctor_id = doctors.doctor_id JOIN patients ON appointments.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date = '2022-09-15' ORDER BY doctor_first_name DESC, patient_first_name ASC;

SELECT medications.drug_name, medications.dosage, medications.frequency, patients.first_name AS patient_first_name FROM medications JOIN patients ON medications.patient_id = patients.patient_id WHERE medications.dosage > '100mg';
SELECT DISTINCT doctors.specialty FROM doctors JOIN appointments ON doctors.doctor_id = appointments.doctor_id WHERE appointments.appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
